name: Age of Discovery Colonization
description:
The colonization has started accross the new continent. All big nations has started to settle down and take advantage of huge resources.

Lead your colony , settle down , harvest, mine and trade your goods in the online exchange market.

Sometimes you do not need a gun or sword to win a battle. Economy will be your main weapon.

Take the control of the market and eliminate other players.
Use the Black Market items, raid rival factions, manipulate the market, sabotage your rivals and boost your economy.

Age of Discovery: Colonization is the strategy game that economy will be your main weapon to win the war!!

Features:

- Play against AI
- Play against other players in Multiplayer mode (coming soon)
- 5 factions each has pros and cons
- 3D World map with huge resources
- Online Exhange Market that prices will change instantly
- Black Market Items to use against your rivals
- Take your position in online players list.
publishers: IYIFIKIR ELEKTRONIK HIZMETLER VE TICAET LTD STI
